Class BaseHtmlParser

Base ResponseParser, which supports

  • loading the HTML and creating a ParsingContext
  • parsing of lists

Hierarchy

  • BaseHtmlParser
    • DefaultResponseParser

Methods

parseList

  • parseList<T>(container: Cheerio, context: ParsingContext, listName: string, listConfig: ListParsingConfig, boxIterator: (box: Cheerio, context: ParsingContext, cb: CallbackFunction) => void, callback: ListParsingCallback<T>): void

  • Detects arbitrary lists at iterates over it's boxes asyncroniously.

    Type parameters

    • T

    Parameters

    • container: Cheerio

      The base container which is the entrypoint

    • context: ParsingContext
    • listName: string

      The name of the list, used for debug logs

    • listConfig: ListParsingConfig

      The config for parsing the list

    • boxIterator: (box: Cheerio, context: ParsingContext, cb: CallbackFunction) => void

      A callback function which will be called for each box found in the list

        • (box: Cheerio, context: ParsingContext, cb: CallbackFunction): void

        • Parameters

          • box: Cheerio
          • context: ParsingContext
          • cb: CallbackFunction

          Returns void

    • callback: ListParsingCallback<T>

      The completion callback which will be called with final parsed data objects and opionally a url for the next page to crawl

    Returns void

prepareHtmlParsing

  • prepareHtmlParsing(html: string, context: Context): { container: Cheerio; parsingContext: ParsingContext }

  • Loads the html text of a response into a cheerio container and creates a corresponding parsing context.

    Parameters

    • html: string
    • context: Context

    Returns { container: Cheerio; parsingContext: ParsingContext }

    • container: Cheerio
    • parsingContext: ParsingContext
